name: Separation (itch) (creacion_videojuegos)
description:
Our planet is in serious danger and these may be our last hours before disappearing forever...

The core has stopped and the magma is breaking the tectonic plates causing our planet to be breaking into pieces in the middle of infinite space....

There is an old legend that told about a hidden gem hidden in our planet that can revitalize the core and prevent the disaster.

We need a heroine who can recover it but to complete the mission she needs a SPECIAL POWER.

At the bottom of our planet elemental beings inhabit impregnable labyrinths. To have any chance we grant you the power to separate your BODY from your SOUL and thus, cross places that would otherwise be impossible.

Come on... We are in hurry... We haven't time!!

This is a game inspired by students of extra school activity from 7 to 12 years old.
